channel.title: RunePlay - Sexy Front and Back End Server
channel.description:
[center] Well first of all I would like to say hey to everyone because I used to be active on these forums but then I decided to quit. But now I am back. I am starting a new project and I hope to release and host this server unlike all my others. When I quit I deleted my old servers, sorry.
[I will update this topic so check back]
[size=20pt][u][b]RunePlay[/b][/u][/size]
Well I started using Fedexer's base "Fearscape" as the server. Because all the classes are messy, badly arranged and just plain fucking ugly. I have decided I am refactoring, renaming and reogranising everything. I am renaming all the classes. Moving all code inside them around and trying to strip alot of "client". Normally I wouldn't use a shit-filled server base but I have always liked Fedexer so I thought I would use his base.[/center]
Okay well here is some of the classes:
[ul][li]CharacterVariables - 1.23 KB[/li] [li]ClientListener - 5.95 KB[/li] [li]Clues - 2.35 KB[/li] [li]Communication - 256 Bytes[/li] [li]Configuration - 144 Bytes[/li] [li]DialogueHandler - 4.96 KB[/li] [li]GraphicsHandler - 3.00 KB[/li] [li]GroundSpawns - 2.01 KB[/li] [li]ItemHandler - 10.5 KB[/li] [li]ItemIntegers - 42.0 KB[/li] [li]ItemList - 287 Bytes[/li] [li]ItemLoader - 3.02 KB[/li] [li]NpcDrops - 293 Bytes[/li] [li]NPCHandler - 71.1 KB[/li] [li]NpcList - 179 Bytes[/li] [li]NpcParse - 4.57 KB[/li] [li]ObjectHandler - 5.10 KB[/li] [li]PacketEncryption - 4.81 KB[/li] [li]PacketProtocol - 9.88 KB[/li] [li]Player - 46.0 KB[/li] [li]PlayerHandler - 17.3 KB[/li] [li]Print - 177 Bytes[/li] [li]RandomItems - 6.92 KB[/li] [li]SaveGameHandler - 2.02 KB[/li] [li]ServerCore - 984 KB[/li] [li]ServerRestart - 941 Bytes[/li] [li]ShopHandler - 4.63 KB[/li] [li]Translation - 5.98 KB[/li][/ul]
[b]Download:[/b] Comming Soon.
This was updated last: [i]13/12/2007[/i]
Thankyou I hope you support me on this. I'll be seeing use around. Have fun.
~Zandia

[/quote] You need a mute.[/quote]
he needs a bitch slap.

item.title: RunePlay - Sexy Front and Back End Server
item.dc:creator: @Zandia Zandia
item.description:
@Zandia wrote:

[center]
Well first of all I would like to say hey to everyone because I used to be active on these forums but then I decided to quit. But now I am back. I am starting a new project and I hope to release and host this server unlike all my others. When I quit I deleted my old servers, sorry.

[I will update this topic so check back]

[size=20pt]RunePlay[/size]

Well I started using Fedexer’s base “Fearscape” as the server. Because all the classes are messy, badly arranged and just plain fucking ugly. I have decided I am refactoring, renaming and reogranising everything. I am renaming all the classes. Moving all code inside them around and trying to strip alot of “client”. Normally I wouldn’t use a shit-filled server base but I have always liked Fedexer so I thought I would use his base.[/center]

Okay well here is some of the classes:

[ul][li]CharacterVariables - 1.23 KB[/li]
[li]ClientListener - 5.95 KB[/li]
[li]Clues - 2.35 KB[/li]
[li]Communication - 256 Bytes[/li]
[li]Configuration - 144 Bytes[/li]
[li]DialogueHandler - 4.96 KB[/li]
[li]GraphicsHandler - 3.00 KB[/li]
[li]GroundSpawns - 2.01 KB[/li]
[li]ItemHandler - 10.5 KB[/li]
[li]ItemIntegers - 42.0 KB[/li]
[li]ItemList - 287 Bytes[/li]
[li]ItemLoader - 3.02 KB[/li]
[li]NpcDrops - 293 Bytes[/li]
[li]NPCHandler - 71.1 KB[/li]
[li]NpcList - 179 Bytes[/li]
[li]NpcParse - 4.57 KB[/li]
[li]ObjectHandler - 5.10 KB[/li]
[li]PacketEncryption - 4.81 KB[/li]
[li]PacketProtocol - 9.88 KB[/li]
[li]Player - 46.0 KB[/li]
[li]PlayerHandler - 17.3 KB[/li]
[li]Print - 177 Bytes[/li]
[li]RandomItems - 6.92 KB[/li]
[li]SaveGameHandler - 2.02 KB[/li]
[li]ServerCore - 984 KB[/li]
[li]ServerRestart - 941 Bytes[/li]
[li]ShopHandler - 4.63 KB[/li]
[li]Translation - 5.98 KB[/li][/ul]

Download: Comming Soon.

This was updated last: 13/12/2007

Thankyou I hope you support me on this. I’ll be seeing use around. Have fun.

~Zandia
